name: Industrielle Biotechnologie Bayern Netzwerk GmbH
goal: Promotion of Industrial Biotechnology and sustainable Economy by specific tasks and services, paricularly the coordination and the management of the Bavarian Industrial Biotechnology Network (IBB), catalysis of technology transfer, PR, dissimination of relevant information and by supporting the dialogue of enterprises with politics.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment
euInitiatives: Joint Undertaking (public-private partnership) Bio-based Industries within EU programme Horizon 2020
